refnamediv.refpurpose: Copies the contents of the specified binary object into the specified file.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Copies the contents of the specified binary object into the specified file. Currently, only binary objects containing a uniform array of simple objects are supported.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the export_body command to copy the contents of a particular binary object into a specified file.

example.title: Copy the contents of a binary object into a file.

listitem.para: Copies the contents of bin_chars into the file /home/fred/chars.
